title: 10 Countries in Asia Pacific with the largest number of Christians in 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Christian population in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Estimated Christian population in millions 86.79 is found at Country Philippines and the minimum is found at Burma (Myanmar) where Country is 3.79.
There is a difference of 83.0 between the maximum Country Philippines and minimum Country Burma (Myanmar).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated Christian population in millions for 10 number of Countrys.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Christian population in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Estimated Christian population in millions 86.79 is found at Country Philippines and the minimum is found at Burma (Myanmar) where Country is 3.79.
There is a difference of 83.0 between the maximum Country Philippines and minimum Country Burma (Myanmar).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated Christian population in millions for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Estimated Christian population in millions 86.79 is found at Country Philippines and the minimum is found at Burma (Myanmar) where Country is 3.79.
There is a difference of 83.0 between the maximum Country Philippines and minimum Country Burma (Myanmar).
Estimated Christian population in millions at Country Philippines is 86.79 , second place is China at 67.07, and thirdly is India at 31.85.
The Country Philippines tends to be 3.35 percent higher than average.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is 258.81 if we add up values of all Countrys.
